text: The Sarine or Saane is a river in Switzerland.6th longest, 7th largest basin, see List of rivers of Switzerland It is long and has a drainage area of . It is a tributary of the river Aare. The Sarine rises in the Bernese Alps, near Sanetschhorn, in the Canton of Valais. It flows through the Swiss cantons of Bern, Fribourg, Valais, and Vaud. == References == Category:Rivers of Switzerland Category:Canton of Bern Category:Canton of Fribourg Category:Geography of Valais Category:Vaud
title: Saane/Sarine
